name: Mystical
description: Mystical is a new kind of puzzle game. Collect hundreds of items in five mystical places and combine them all in a given time.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 - 32 bits Processor: Processor Dual Core Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews.review_text: hello ! I thought that it seems to be hard but after playing many times. I love this challenge after work: a moment for pleasure without hard music and flashing display. Some originality in this game. So I recommend you that pleasant game. Hi !
